"File list with Electronic Signature" widget
The
"File list with Electronic Signature" widget
allows displaying files (documents) that contain a signature (electronic signature, simple electronic signature) attached to the System object.
Examples of a customized widget:
To create widget, go to the Widgets tab, select the "File list with electronic signature" element and drag it to the workspace. To configure the widget, fill in the parameters in the object profile.
Each parameter has a corresponding value:
Settings
Purpose
Attribute with files
Selecting the attribute of the System object that stores the attached files.
Show classifications
Selecting the file classification to display (if necessary).
Title text
Enter the title text of the file display area (if necessary).
Text of button "Show all"
Enter the text of the displayed button name (if necessary).
Signature type
Determining the signature type. Possible values:
1. Electronic Signature;
2. Simple Electronic Signature.
Visibility. Users and groups. Electronic Signature
Determining the user group for which these files will be available.
Action with Electronic Signature
Selecting the action to be applied to the file.
Next, configure the parameters that define the visual of the files.
The size of files uploaded to the System is limited. Find more details in the
article
.
Settings
Purpose
Visible items number
Determining the number of files displayed in the table.
Group files into classification folders
1. Classification algorithm (returns a collection of classification IDs belonging to the main documents group);
2. Sorting algorithm (returns a collection of classification IDs in sorted order).
Show date column
Displaying a column with the file creation date (if necessary).
Show classification column
Displaying a column with classification by folder. For example, System files, Other, etc. (if necessary).
Default way to open files (docx)
Choosing the way to open the file. For example, "Open in EDoc", "Preview".
When clicking on the corresponding buttons, actions that will be applied to the attached files are available.
Next, consider the available functions:
— copy element;
— save visual settings;
— reset registry settings and/or add/copy/delete file;
— download files by pre-selecting the desired files;
— attach files from the list;
— customize the visual of files. The flat view does not take into account the structure, the hierarchical (nested) view displays files based on the nesting elements structure;
— sign file with electronic signature;
— sign file with simple electronic signature;
— pre-select and download the file;
— download all elements;
— select previously downloaded files or files from the system and attach them;
— select files from a personal computer and upload to the system;
— select version ;
— combine signatures into a single zip file;
— download all files and all file signatures, all signatures of one file will be combined.
